Steering wheel with built-in GPS and mapping system: This steering wheel will have a GPS and mapping system integrated into it, allowing drivers to navigate and keep track of their location without having to take their eyes off the road. It will also have real-time traffic updates, making it easier for drivers to plan their route and avoid congested areas.

Steering wheel with voice control: This steering wheel will have a built-in voice control system that allows drivers to control their car's features without having to take their hands off the wheel. This will include things like changing the radio station, adjusting the temperature, and even making phone calls.

Steering wheel with built-in entertainment system: This steering wheel will have an entertainment system built into it, allowing drivers to listen to music, watch movies, and play games while driving. It will also have a touch screen display that allows drivers to control the entertainment system with ease.

Steering wheel with built-in safety features: This steering wheel will have built-in safety features like lane departure warning, blind spot monitoring, and collision avoidance. It will also have a touch screen display that allows drivers to view their car's safety features and adjust them as needed.

Steering wheel with built-in wireless charging pad: This steering wheel will have a built-in wireless charging pad that allows drivers to charge their phone while driving. It will also have a touch screen display that allows drivers to view their phone's battery life and adjust the charging settings.
